price: او دوى وويل: رحمان اولاد لري! هغه لره پاكي ده، (نه) بلكى هغوى خو عزتمن بندګان دي.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۚ بَلۡ عِبَادٞ مُّكۡرَمُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waqālū ittakhadha al-raḥmānu waladan sub'ḥānahu bal ʿibādun muk'ramūna
